pageContext.claim: “If you look at other countries even countries that you think they are doing well they don't talk about $150,000 as being median. $150,000, that is tremendous. That is a great tribute to the people of our country.”
pageContext.analysis: Median household income in the U.S. is close to $62,000, according to the U.S. Census Bureau. It’s not clear where Trump found $150,000.
